org.mapsforge.map.rendertheme.renderinstruction

Interface RenderInstruction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Area, Caption, Circle, Line, LineSymbol, PathText, Symbol

    public interface RenderInstruction
    A RenderInstruction is a basic graphical primitive to draw a map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void renderNode(RenderCallback renderCallback, List<Tag> tags) 
      void renderWay(RenderCallback renderCallback, List<Tag> tags) 
      void scaleStrokeWidth(float scaleFactor)
      Scales the stroke width of this RenderInstruction by the given factor.
      void scaleTextSize(float scaleFactor)
      Scales the text size of this RenderInstruction by the given factor.

    • Method Detail

      • renderNode

        void renderNode(RenderCallback renderCallback,
                List<Tag> tags)
        Parameters:
        renderCallback - a reference to the receiver of all render callbacks.
        tags - the tags of the node.

      • renderWay

        void renderWay(RenderCallback renderCallback,
               List<Tag> tags)
        Parameters:
        renderCallback - a reference to the receiver of all render callbacks.
        tags - the tags of the way.

      • scaleStrokeWidth

        void scaleStrokeWidth(float scaleFactor)
        Scales the stroke width of this RenderInstruction by the given factor.
        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - the factor by which the stroke width should be scaled.

      • scaleTextSize

        void scaleTextSize(float scaleFactor)
        Scales the text size of this RenderInstruction by the given factor.
        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - the factor by which the text size should be scaled.
